titleStmt.title: A proposal for a national bank consisting of land, or any other valuable securities or depositions, with a grand cash for returns of money, &c., from all parts within His Majesty's dominions of England, Scotland, and Ireland, &c. : the vvhole to be under the care, inspection, trust, and controul of the publick authority, and legal magistracy : as the same was presented to the Right Honourable Sir Thomas Lane, Knight, Lord Mayor of the city of London / by Robert Murray, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Murray, Robert, 1635-1725?
